name: Blast
long_description: Refactor works closely with large organizations across healthcare, retail, and logistics to safely tackle their most ambitious AI use-cases in record time. We focus on building autonomous systems that call, click, and navigate legacy software systems. We deploy software exclusively on-premises. We have worked with companies serving tens of millions of customers and with $50B+ annual revenue.
one_liner: Helping enterprises build safe and compliant LLM apps/agents
